column5: Well as some of you may know my Dad (mistyriver1) left for a ice fishing trip with some of his friends to Lake Nippissing.  So I have been watching WFN all weekend  Anyway my Dad has been making bucktails since New Years and i would help him a bit with a few of them here and there...  But since I was kind of bored I decided to make one of my own and surprise him when he gets home.  It is not as good as the ones my dad makes but i still like it.  I liked the powder painting part alot and also had fun with the rest. I think that the hardest parts for me were choosing which colour beads to use  and also the loop    I have no idea how you guys bend the thick shafts   Anyway here it is...          Thanks for reading, Corey
Thats lookin pretty good for not having much practice. The first 5 that I bent up went in the trash they were so awful. Keep at it I think you have a talent for it.  Art
Well done Corey keep practicing!  Whopper
good start Cory keep em comin cant wait for the first report wit ha pike on the other end of it.
Looks good to me Corey, I'm sure your dad will be very pleasantly surprised.  Keep up the good work, and don't forget the camera when you take it out the first time.  Maureen
